dublin_core.dcvalue: MyHeart is a so called Integrated Project of the European Union aiming to develop intelligent systems for the prevention and monitoring of cardiovascular diseases The project develops smart electronic and textile systems and appropriate services that empower the users to take control of their own health status
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
The MyHeart project--fighting cardiovascular diseases by prevention and early diagnosis.
